The Description is in Greek, this is why it canâ€™t be displayed. 

The story takes place in a modern family which has its own problems and of course its own dirty secrets! The protagonist of the story is Nick, his wife Maya and her friend Electra, the 2 young boys who are neighbors of the family, their daughter Voula, Nikoleta an Italian friend, and a father's friend Zafeiris.

  Maya is not happy with her life after her marriage to Nick because they face problems with their sex-life. V tries t help her friend by calling the two young  boys who are neighbors of the family.. Meanwhile Nick has dirty dreams with the Italian friend of her dirty daughter.. And the story just beginning..

  Cast: Nicoletta Romanoi, Voula Vavatsi, Ian Scott, Electra, Nick, Anthony, Zafeiris Ntouros
